Trota.I was born May 10,2004.I'm 16 Years old turning 17.I like singing,dancing and drawing,I love old song also because it's good to listen. 2.Why did you enroll as an ICT student? Why not other track or strands?

I enrolled in ICT because i want to be a computer engineering i want to know more about computer.I didn't choose other strand because will not help when I choose a different strand because i will take computer engineering course.

3.What is your dream job? How do you think will this course will help you in pursuing your career?

Like what I said earlier I want to be an Computer Engeering I think this course will help to achieve my dreams,When I finish this course I can help my family so I will try my best to finish my studies.

4. To whom are you dedicating your success in finishing course? Yourself, family, friends, special someone etc. Why?

I dedicate my success to myself and to my family also because they guided and help me in my studies.I try my best to being a successful someday.I will do everything to fulfill my dreams.I want to reciproicate what they do for me and for my siblings also.
